description: Doncaster power to a 3-0 win over relegation-threatened Carlisle to keep their League Two automatic promotion hopes firmly in their own hands.
title: Doncaster Rovers 3-0 Carlisle United
title_page: Doncaster Rovers 3-0 Carlisle United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Doncaster Rovers have won just one of their last six league games against Carlisle United (D2 L3), conceding 2+ goals in four of those matches.
Carlisle United have lost just three of their last 11 away league games against Doncaster Rovers (W5 D3), keeping five clean sheets during that time.
Since the start of February 2024, Doncaster have won 17 of their 26 home league games (D5 L4) â€“ the third-most in League Two in this period, after Bradford City (20) and Walsall (18).
